nodes.text: Shaara and the Sarlacc: The Skiff Guard's Tale

Dan'l Danehy-Oakes's short story, Shaara and the Sarlacc: The Skiff Guard's Tale appeared in Tales from Jabba's Palace which was published in January 1996 by Bantam Spectra, it Is also narrated in first person. In it, a Skiff Guard under the employment of Jabba the Hutt recalls a story about his sister Shaara encountering the Sarlacc, which he relays to Boba Fett. This happens as Luke Skywalker and Han Solo are being taken to the Great Pit of Carkoon to be eaten.
The story is described in the "About the Authors" section of Tales from Jabba's Palace as being a small vengeance on "Certain Persons. You know who you are..."
